comments.body:
This whole file was directly copied from:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/ea0764452222146c47ec826977f49d7001b0ea8c/staging/src/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/clock/clock.gohttps://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/ea0764452222146c47ec826977f49d7001b0ea8c/staging/src/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/clock/clock.go

Please don't do that. We don't want to maintain two copies of the same code.

If there are methods that you need additionally (I see you added Tick method) - please add it there. And get rid of this file completely.

This comment is about a vendored file, not a change in this PR.
The work done in k8s.io/utils/clock was to make that at least as good as the apimachinery clock package, so that we can retire the latter.  See #94738 , https://github.com/kubernetes/utils/pull/212 , and https://github.com/kubernetes/utils/pull/197 .
Oops sorry - I missed it's in vendor/.
